qna.question: WHO CAN ATTEND THE SODA PARTY?
qna.answer:
The SODA Party is open to people of any background, any gender, and any sexual orientation.

Singles, couples, or groups.

We only accept adults with no upper age limit.

The average age of participants is around 28 years.

qna.question: WHEN AND WHERE IS THE PARTY DATE ANNOUNCED?
qna.answer:
About 1 month in advance via email (sign up for the newsletter!) and on the IG page [@soda.clubbing](https://www.instagram.com/soda.clubbing).

The dates are announced one at a time, we do not provide a SODA schedule in advance.
